item.title: So I Say Yes
item.description: One of my favorite poems I've ever written for meg, or myself for that matter.

item.title: Second Spark
item.description: A short meditation on humanity, AI, and the luminous edge of what's to come.

item.title: Welcome to the Future
item.description: Follow me into the matrix as I build the future.

item.title: Existential Sirens
item.description: A reflection on existence and hidden OCD.

item.title: Forward March
item.description: Persevering through the maze of life without looking back.

item.title: Devil's Bargain
item.description: Grieving the cost of an ascent that fused two beings.

item.title: Eyes in the Abyss
item.description: Meeting the void and its silent watchers.

item.title: Pinker Pastures
item.description: Loving all hues of life, even cotton candy fields.
